message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. While $12,500 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $13,000. Can you consider that?
